attributes.action: send EVERY available intelligence & resource to assist in finding madeleine mCcann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe I speak for many people when I say that the people of europe and beyond want to do whatever neccersery to find british FOUR year old  Madeleine McCann & bring her safely home. she is a British citizen and as such deserves our every effort in finding her. I petition the Prime Minister to send EVERY available intelligence & resource to assist in the search, and use every contact,which he might have to bring Madeleine back. Thank you.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HelpMadeleine/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
